body_html:
I have the same problem with the tensorflow/tensorflow:0.12.1 image. In older images Pillow was included but it's missing in newer images.

I checked the Dockerfile and it contains the instructions to install Pillow but the image from docker hub is build without.

docker history --no-trunc tensorflow/tensorflow:0.12.1
IMAGE                                                                     CREATED             CREATED BY                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 SIZE                COMMENT
sha256:e3f7f02f1c664e17a5d1ce069175907d6bcea523af4776ef720749aeef81af4d   8 days ago          /bin/sh -c #(nop)  CMD ["/run_jupyter.sh"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 0 B                 
[...]
<missing>                                                                 8 days ago          /bin/sh -c pip --no-cache-dir install         ipykernel         jupyter         matplotlib         numpy         scipy         sklearn         &&     python -m ipykernel.kernelspec                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       378.6 MB            
[...]

Workaround:
Open a Terminal in Jupyter and run pip install Pillow

body:
I have the same problem with the tensorflow/tensorflow:0.12.1 image. In older images Pillow was included but it's missing in newer images.

I checked the [Dockerfile](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/55b01593515817992821423fec19733bca91c918/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile#L33) and it contains the instructions to install Pillow but the image from docker hub is build without.
```
docker history --no-trunc tensorflow/tensorflow:0.12.1
IMAGE                                                                     CREATED             CREATED BY                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 SIZE                COMMENT
sha256:e3f7f02f1c664e17a5d1ce069175907d6bcea523af4776ef720749aeef81af4d   8 days ago          /bin/sh -c #(nop)  CMD ["/run_jupyter.sh"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 0 B                 
[...]
<missing>                                                                 8 days ago          /bin/sh -c pip --no-cache-dir install         ipykernel         jupyter         matplotlib         numpy         scipy         sklearn         &&     python -m ipykernel.kernelspec                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       378.6 MB            
[...]
```

Workaround:
Open a Terminal in Jupyter and run `pip install Pillow`
